title: Pet World: My Animal Hospital
description:
Become a pet vet and manage your own animal hospital and play fun minigames in this exciting veterinarian game! Take care of sweet pets and exotic animals in your vet clinic. Dogs, monkeys, alpacas, and pandas need your help. Diagnose and treat various conditions like lacerations, torn muscles, and mosquito bites. Research diseases and develop treatments to keep your pet hospital thriving!

Pet World - My Animal Hospital Game Features:
- Manage your own vet hospital
- Learn the daily tasks of a veterinarian doctor
- Examine and care for cute animals
- Play fun minigames
- Collect daily coins and rewards
- Unlock various  veterinarian treatment rooms
- Customize your veterinarian clinic with decorations

A Variety of Minigames
In this vet game, you can diagnose bruises, broken paws, or infections through fun minigames. Use tools like the stethoscope and thermometer to find symptoms and treat the animals in the appropriate wards with x-rays or ultrasounds.

Care for a Variety of Cute Animals
Treat friendly cats, dogs, and exotic animals like ocelots, polar bears, and koalas. Their realistic yet adorable depictions will win your heart as a vet.

Decorate Your Vet Hospital
Expand your veterinarian hospital to accommodate more patients. Decorate with plants, paintings, and rugs to make your clinic inviting. Enhance the outdoor area for a stunning view.

Manage Your Veterinary Clinic
Keep your inventory stocked with food, medicine, and bandages. Find hidden coins and medical bags, or spin the wheel of fortune for prizes.

Teamwork
Hire nurses and veterinarians to help with the workload. They will assist in caring for the animals and ensure your vet hospital runs smoothly.

Your animal patients are waiting! Build your veterinary clinic now and care for adorable pets in need. Become the greatest pet vet in this captivating veterinarian game!
